name: immaturely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not as calm and wise as people expect from someone of a particular age: The teenagers sniggered and giggled immaturely at all of the love scenes.act immaturely He conceded he had acted immaturely.behave immaturely I've told her she's behaving immaturely and that she'll regret her decision later.
More examplesFewer examplesHe said that the incident had got out of hand and accepted that he had behaved immaturely. She can be at the same time charismatic, wilful, and immaturely boastful.It's amazing to me that someone in that position could act so immaturely.
